extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • calc_display_dist

        public double calc_display_dist(double dist)
        Converts actual distance into display distance.
        Parameters:
        dist - actual distance from center of rotation (in million km)
        Returns:
        distance for display

      • calc_display_dia

        public double calc_display_dia(double dia)
        Converts actual diameter into display diameter. If the calculated diameter is too short, it will set it to 4 pixels for visibility issues.
        Parameters:
        dia - actual diameter (in million km)
        Returns:
        diameter for display

      • calc_new_ang

        public double calc_new_ang(double current_ang,
                           double ang)
        Calculates the new angle for an solar object
        Parameters:
        current_ang - current angle of the solar object
        ang - angle per movement
        Returns:
        new angle after movement
